attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These animals are being slaughtered in disgusting ways, and is taking our ENGLISH  business away. Why is it allowed to go on, support our animals, kill them in humane ways.  These people are from barbaric times and is not true English way. Why are we to stop and provide for the minority and change our ways? It's our right to take a stand and not to be over run by these immigrants wantings. These animals can be blessed once on the plate, why change a occupation and take our jobs away because we are customed to your way. Is this right and fair for the ENGLAND

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
